refnamediv.refpurpose: Select the current font face and size

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The last parameter encoding can take the following values: "MacRomanEncoding", "MacExpertEncoding", "WinAnsiEncoding", and "&null;". "&null;" stands for the font's built-in encoding.
See the ClibPDF Manual for more information, especially how to support Asian fonts.
